name: Cobra Mission: Panic in the Cobra City
name_original: Cobra Mission: Panic in the Cobra City
description:
Cobra Mission: Panic in the Cobra City is an adventure-RPG game developed by MegaTech Software. It was originally released in 1992. It was published by MegaTech Software. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
Cobra Mission: Panic in the Cobra City is available on PC.
